Posts.Content: Apr 24, 2009 10:17PM Questions_77 wrote: Hello. Yes. She had mets in her lungs, liver bones (ribs, spine, pelvis) and I believe her spleen. The lung mets have not been giving her trouble for at least a year and a half now (she used to cough a lot).

Posts.Content: Jun 26, 2009 09:01PM Questions_77 wrote: Hello everyone. After palliative care to the breast my mom passed away suddenly (she was on an up-cycle physically so it was not expected even though we knew she would pass sooner rather than later) on June 5. She was 52 years old and it was my Dad's birthday.  May God continue to bless you all as you bring the fight to this disease. I appreciate all the support you gave to me.
